subject: The Internet Patrol -  Hotmail Servers Down - Again
body:
The Internet Patrol


 The Internet Patrol
http://www.theinternetpatrol.com

Hotmail Servers Down - Again

Can't get into your Hotmail email?  Not getting that expected email from a Hotmail user?  That's because the Hotmail servers are down, again.   

Read more here: Hotmail Servers Down - Again 

Do you know anybody participating in a run, walk, ride or other charity event "..for the Cure"?  Please check out our latest "for the cause" website at http://www.TheSiteForTheCure.com !  The Site for the Cure is a free community-based site where people participating in such events can put up their own page with a link to their "sponsor me" page, create their own blog, and participate in forums!  All free, all for the cause!  http://www.TheSiteForTheCure.com
